nodes.text: Chandra Conrad was a female Zabrak individual who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. She had information about the Black Sun crime syndicate, and came forward sometime after 0 BBY as part of an investigation by Corran Horn of the Corellian Security Force. Horn had a trustworthy agent escort Conrad safely back to the city of Doaba Guerfel on Corellia.

Chandra Conrad was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
